title: Firefox 3 text rendering
content:
Is anyone else using Firefox 3 yet? I’m wondering what other people think of the text rendering. I find that sans type looks much crisper, but that the anti-aliasing makes a mess out of serifs.

 [‹ an alternative font to Microgramma](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051526/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39338 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fonts on the web - Surveys! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051526/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38872 "Go to next forum topic")
